link.title: Central School District 301 » Home Comments Feed

div.h2: Welcome to Central Community Unit School District 301
div.p: Our goal is that all Central students graduate ready to be successful in college and equipped with the necessary skills needed to transition into the workplace. This preparation begins on the first day your child enters a Central 301 classroom, and all Central 301 staff look forward to assisting in your child’s educational journey.

a.h2: Central 301 Named to AP Honor Roll
